location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch Map of the Vilayet of Basra’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 200 x 140mm, on sheet 240 x 180mm.Materials: black ink on paper.

mods.abstract: Map showing the vilayet, or administrative district of Basra, Mesopotamia [Iraq]. The map indicates: the city of Basra, Muhamrah [Khorramshahr], and other surrounding towns; the boundary of the vilayet as a dotted and dashed line; coastline; the Euphrates and Tigris rivers and their tributaries. A note at the bottom of the map indicates that it was produced by the Ordnance Survey Office in 1914. The map is part of a diplomatic and consular report on trade in Basra, edited at the Foreign Office and Board of Trade, and presented to both Houses of Parliament in August 1914 (ff 293-303).
